titleStmt.title: Their Majesties declaration against the French King
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by the order of the Committee of Estates,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given at Our Court at Hampton Court, the seventh day of May, 1689. In the first year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
